main event: A brilliant object, identified as a weather balloon, was observed traveling over Panama City, Florida on December 14, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a star and traveled too fast to be one., It appeared to change direction due to varying winds., The sighting lasted approximately 20 seconds., Weather forecasters corroborated the balloon's path over Panama City., The observation was reported by military personnel during a classified investigation.
